amendment.description: To require an annual report on Saudi Arabia's cooperation in the war on terrorism.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1153 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1153 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Daschle to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9162-9166; text: CR S9193) To require an annual report on Saudi Arabia's cooperation in the war on terrorism.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1153 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Daschle to Amendment SA 1136.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1153 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
